config:

    showBits: true
---
packet-beta

title IPv4 Header Format
0-3: "Version (Education_ContentCDN)"
4-7: "IHL (Education_LMS_Portal)"
8-15: "Type of Service (Education_StudentDB)"
16-31: "Total Length (Education_ClassroomService)"
32-47: "Identification (Education_ContentCDN)"
48-50: "Flags (Education_GradeSync)"
51-63: "Fragment Offset (Education_StudentDB)"
64-71: "Time to Live (Education_ClassroomService)"
72-79: "Protocol (Education_StudentDB)"
80-95: "Header Checksum (Education_StudentDB)"
96-127: "Source Address (Education_StudentDB)"
128-159: "Destination Address (Education_LMS_Portal)"
160-191: "Options (Education_StudentDB)"
192-223: "Padding"

repo_description: Material en abierto para la asignatura Juegos en Red del Grado en Videojuegos de la URJC
